# IDistributionContract
[Git Source](https://github.com/Uniswap/twap-auction/blob/e1dbf4f02e1bcbb91486a39f0f49eb2aeb52ecc6/src/interfaces/external/IDistributionContract.sol)

Interface for token distribution contracts.


## Functions
### onTokensReceived

Notify a distribution contract that it has received the tokens to distribute


```solidity
function onTokensReceived() external;
```
